Timing schedule.title: Timing schedule
Timing schedule.description: A timing schedule that specifies an event that occured or may occur multiple times as defined by FHIR Timing https://www.hl7.org/fhir/datatypes.html#Timing.

bounds_duration_minutes.description: duration of the event in minutes.

count_max.description: maximum number of times to repeat

frequency.description: event occurs frequency times per period

frequency_max.description: event occurs frequency_max times per period

period.description: event occurs frequency times per period

day_of_week.description: CSV values from day_of_week to allow for multiple values as required by fhir.

when.description: code for time period of occurance as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/event-timing

code.description: BID | TID | QID | AM | PM | QD | QOD | + and other values defined here: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/v3/GTSAbbreviation/cs.html

time_units.description: unit of measure for the duration.

day_of_week.description: unit of measure for the day of the week.
